game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle, containing an ancient relic of immense power. The locals are too afraid to venture near it, but the promise of treasure and knowledge is too great to resist.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, +2 reputation with the Adventurer's Guild

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location and layout
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather any information you can about the lost temple. They may have heard rumors or know someone who has ventured near it.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle to reach the temple entrance
task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle, avoiding deadly traps and vicious creatures. The journey will be treacherous, but the reward is worth it.
task.location: The Jungle, near the old ruins

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the temple's inner sanctum
task.description: Face your greatest challenge yet as you navigate deadly traps and battle fearsome guardians to reach the heart of the temple. The artifact awaits, but be prepared for a fight.
